coopt.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make someone a member of a group, committee etc, by the agreement of all the members
coopt.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The committee may co-opt additional members for special purposes.
She was coopted onto the county education committee.
coopt.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to persuade someone to help or support you
coopt.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Social scientists were co-opted to work with the development agencies.
Nan was coopted into the kitchen to make pastry.
